ObjectTerritory2Association.name: ObjectTerritory2Association
ObjectTerritory2Association.description: Represents an association (by assignment) between a territory and an object record such as an account or a lead.

AssociationCause.description: The means by which the record was associated with the territory. User interface field label is Method.

ObjectId.description: The ID of the object assigned to the territory. Object Availability Account API version 30.0 and later Lead API version 55.0 and later

Territory2Id.description: The ID of the territory that the record is assigned to.
